results.title: Metformin-treated patients with type 2 diabetes have normal mitochondrial complex I respiration.
results.text_hl: Inhibition of complex I @<m>DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@and II@@@ respiration in controls was demonstrated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ titration in vitro at doses well above those observed during @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Larsen S, Rabøl R, Hansen CN, Madsbad S, Helge JW, Dela F. Metformin-treated patients with type 2 diabetes have normal mitochondrial complex I respiration. Diabetologia. 2012 Feb;55(2):443-9. PMID: 22009334
citations.BibTeX: @article{22009334, title={Metformin-treated patients with type 2 diabetes have normal mitochondrial complex I respiration.}, author={Larsen S and Rabøl R and Hansen CN and Madsbad S and Helge JW and Dela F}, journal={Diabetologia}, volume={55}, number={2}, pages={443-9}}

results.title: A pilot trial of metformin for insulin resistance and mood disturbances in adolescent and adult women with polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: The BAI scores were higher in adolescent group while BDI-II scores were higher in the adult group (p = .016). After 90-day @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, both BDI-@<m>DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@ and BAI scores were decreased by 3.3 and 3.4, respectively (p < .001).

citations.NLM: Erensoy H, Niafar M, Ghafarzadeh S, Aghamohammadzadeh N, Nader ND. A pilot trial of metformin for insulin resistance and mood disturbances in adolescent and adult women with polycystic ovary syndrome. Gynecol Endocrinol. 2019 Jan;35(1):72-75. PMID: 30182764
